description: This header file defines the interface for interacting with Dobby containers within the WPEFramework plugin system. It declares the DobbyInterface class, which provides methods for managing container lifecycle, querying status, executing commands, and handling container annotations and mounting operations.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: Provides an interface to manage and control Dobby containers, including lifecycle operations, state queries, command execution, and event handling within the WPEFramework plugin.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler instance.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources associated with the DobbyInterface.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of current containers.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific container identified by its ID.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Returns the current state of the specified container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with provided parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container based on a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops the specified container, optionally forcibly.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses the specified container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates the specified container with given options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside the specified container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to a container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation key from a container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a source file or directory into the container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a target path from the container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Event handler invoked when a container starts.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Event handler invoked when a container stops.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Event handler for container state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Handles verification failure for a container.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
